CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bollinger Innovations, Inc. (NASDAQ: BINI), effective July 28, 2025, and formerly, Mullen Automotive Inc. (Nasdaq: MULN), is a Southern California-based automotive company building the next generation of commercial electric vehicles ('EVs') with U.S. based vehicle manufacturing located in Tunica, Mississippi.
